name: Runvirus 2d - Mobile Platformer (Androind only)
description:
The world is full of viruses. They evolved, and now they are fighting against humans. Fight them and try to get home safe!

Hi. My name is Sergiu (LakiDevart) 

This is my first game. I will be happy if you'll play it))))

This game was created more for educational purposes. It only has a few levels and bugs ;) But i put a lot of effort and time into it: I wrote a song for it, I drew all the sprites, and I did all the programming. So I hope you'll like it at least a little))

Follow me on Instagram @lakidevart to see my Indie Game Dev Journey (Pixel Art, Music Creation, Game Dev).
